level.text: The Director shall render a decision in writing no later than forty-five (45) days after the hearing is completed.
A decision of the Director adverse to a respondent shall contain the following:
A statement of appeal rights and the time within which such appeal review is required to be made.
The Director shall serve upon the respondent, or the respondent’s counsel of record, a copy of a written decision within ten (10) days after a decision is rendered.
The Director, in the Director’s discretion, may stay an order pending appeal or reconsideration.
